section.heading: Purpose statement -- Definitions -- Scope of part.

content.p: Effective 11/6/2025 59-12-1401. Purpose statement -- Definitions -- Scope of part. (1) In relation to the tax imposed by this part, the legislative findings described in Section 59-12-701 apply similarly to cities and towns as the findings apply to counties. (2) The definitions of Section 59-12-702 are incorporated into this part. (3) This part applies only to a city or town that is located within a county of the second, third, fourth, fifth, or sixth class as designated in Section 17-60-104 . Amended by Chapter 17 , 2025 Special Session 1
